author: olamy
msg: remove attribute from the test as this failed on a solaris box (attribute is before)

author: assaf
msg: enum.next is JRuby is (gasp) dynamically typed, while enum.next in MRI (via RJB) is the wrong type of typed.  In this reverse world we live in, this ugly hack is the neccessary devil.

author: cmchen
msg: * Added improved support for reading and writing iTXt, tEXt, zTXt Png chunks.
Added a unit test that demonstrates the feature.
* Found a new regression wherein DeflaterOutputStream needs to be closed.

author: olamy
msg: [MCHANGES-47] Add support for multiple <issue> and <due-to> tags in changes.xml

author: hairong
msg: HADOOP-3620. Namenode should synchronously resolve a datanode's network location when the datanode registers. Contributed by Hairong Kuang.
